it.polimi.se2.meteocal.entity

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2.meteocal.entity.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class User
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Entity class for a generic user
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • User

        public User(String firstName,
            String lastName,
            String email,
            String password)
        Constructor taking as parameters the basic data about the user
        Parameters:
        firstName: - the user first name
        lastName: - the user last name
        email: - the user e-mail address
        password: - the user password in clear text, which will be stored as encrypted
